data.text: Yoo kanaa achii isaan kooluu natti haa galan;
Bara dhufuuf jiru keessa Yaaqoob hidda baasa;
Waaqayyo akkuma warra ishee rukutan sana rukute,
Ati waraanuu fi ari始uudhaan isheedhaan wal falmite;
Yommuu inni dhagoota iddoo aarsaa hunda
Magaalaan dallaa jabaa qabdu ni onti;
Dameen ishee yeroo gogutti irraa caccaba;
Bara sana Waaqayyo Laga Efraaxiisii hamma laga Gibxitti midhaan dha始a; yaa Israa始eloota, isin tokko tokkoon walitti ni qabamtu.

Bara sana malakanni guddaan tokko ni afuufama. Warri Asoor keessatti badanii turanii fi warri Gibxi keessatti faffaca始anii turan dhufanii tulluu qulqulluu irratti Yerusaalem keessatti Waaqayyoon waaqeffatu.
